classes run from 9:15 AM to 5 PM in normal days and 9 AM to 3 PM in the month of Ramadan. 1 hour per class during normal times, 40 minutes in month of Ramadan, 5 minutes break between each class

Scholarships offered are merit scholarship: UG scholarship, PG scholarship; means scholarship ; Amity graduate awards, sibling scholarship, Emirati scholarship. visit here for more information: https://amityuniversity.ae/join-amity/scholarships

patterns: what benefits do we get as an alumni
responses:
-Be a part of amity alumni association 
-Gain access to facilities on campus at discounted rates or free of charge.
-Share your success stories, experiences and connections with AUD Alumni and students.
-Let us connect you to relevant departments and industry partners.
-Assist Amity with award winning opportunities.
-Be heard, share your feedback or recommendations
-Get involved in programmes and events.
-Stay connected to friends and your university.
